text: Idea: Spell checker in the Design Manager (similar to VSCode extensions)

Hi All, sorry if this is in the wrong channel - I know it's been kind of asked about before, but I am curious about what the roadmap is for headless type functionality with HubSpot CMS - I see that there are fun things in the product roadmap such as graphql and a DAM, but it would be good to have something close to a timeframe, as the company I work for is considering using HubSpot
